* Elliotte Harold <elharo@...> [2007-07-12 00:00]:
> I remain unimpressed by the claims people make that JSON is
> easier. I've worked with both, and it doesn't seem so to me.
> JSON may be easier than DOM, but it is not easier than XML.

JSON is much simpler than the XML Infoset. Are you willing to
argue about that?

The XML API in use is a red herring. Yes, if you try to do XMLish
things with JSON it wonâ€™t be easier.
